title: Find All Good Strings
content:
Given the strings  and  of size , and the string . Return the number of good strings.
A good string has size , it is alphabetically greater than or equal to , it is alphabetically smaller than or equal to , and it does not contain the string  as a substring. Since the answer can be a huge number, return this modulo 10^9 + 7.
 






 







All strings consist of lowercase English letters.
